Column.Name: GB_ACC
Column.Description: Nucleotide accesion number

Column.Name: PT_GI
Column.Description: Protein gi numbers

Column.Name: ORF
Column.Description: locus tag from NC_004368

Column.Name: Identifier Source
Column.Description: database name

Column.Name: Description
Column.Description: putative function

Column.Name: Sequence Type
Column.Description: control or mRNA

Column.Name: chromStart
Column.Description: start coordinates

Column.Name: chromEnd
Column.Description: stop coordinates

Column.Name: length
Column.Description: ORF length

Column.Name: orientation
Column.Description: coding strain + or -

Column.Name: ergoId
Column.Description: ID in ERGO database

Column.Name: SPOT_ID
Column.Description: identifies controls

Sample.Title: Expression of S. agalactiae NEM316 genes in THY in mid log phase (replicate 1)

Channel.Source: S. agalactiae, 37 degrees at mid log phase (replicate 1)
Channel.Characteristics: strain NEM316 grown in THY broth
Channel.Extract-Protocol: 5ml culture was added to 10ml RNA protect (Qiagen), and GBS collected by centrifugation and stored at -80C. RNA was extracted from bacterial cell pellets through mechanical disruption using glass beads (MatrixB tubes) in a FastPrep machine. RNA was purified using TRIZOL extraction and re-purified on Qiagen miRNeasy columns using standard protocol. DNA was removed with DNA-free (Ambion). RNA quality was assessed by bioanalyzer and O.D. measurements.
Channel.Label: biotin

Sample.Description: Analysis of S. agalactiae gene expression in laboratory medium
Sample.Data-Processing: Raw data normalized to total signal intensity of non redundant S. agalactiae probes present on the array

Column.Name: VALUE
Column.Description: Normalized hybridizaton values of present non-redundant probes

Column.Name: ABS_CALL
Column.Description: A- absent, P- present or M- marginal detection

Series.Title: Analysis of growth-phase regulated genes in Streptococcus agalactiae by global transcript profiling
Series.Summary: We determined dynamic behavior of S. agalactiae transcriptome during growth in THY medium and detected growth phase regulated genes
Series.Overall-Design: Three independent cultures (three biological replicates) of S. agalactiae NEM316 strain in rich laboratory medium were sampled at mid log, late log early and late stationary growth phase.
